p: The data that support the findings of this study are openly available in The Lancet at https://www.thelancet.com/journals/laninf/article/PIIS1473-3099(20)30120-1/fulltext [ 18]. We also used data from the ministry of health of Burkina Faso available in free access at https://www.humanitarianresponse.info/sites/www.humanitarianresponse.info/files/documents/files/sitrep_covid-19_ndeg_115.pdf.
